Articles.Content:
So I have been able to play the game before but in the past few months but then i stopped for a while got back on and kept getting this error: igdumdim64.dll caused an In Page Error (0xc0000006)
  in module igdumdim64.dll at 0033:e9f7afff. Help please.

When do you get this error?  Can you recreate it every time?

We're going to need log files.   A single snipped line doesn't really tell us anything.

As the sticky says, please upload them to a file hosting service, not directly to the Forums.  Thanks.
A short search on Google implies that you should reinstall your intel graphics driver.
